attributes.action: halt plans by the LB of Redbridge to develop Chadwell Heath St Car Park
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Redbridge are trying to build on every bit of spare land they have in the "south" of our borough.  The above station is heavily used by commuters and will only increase in the future as it will be part of crossrail.  The Council should be encouraging this car park so that commuters "park and ride" into town.
